thread.title: Samajwadi Party leader calls PM Narendra Modi a terrorist, Twitter explodes
thread.title_full: Samajwadi Party leader calls PM Narendra Modi a terrorist, Twitter explodes

author: FE Online
title: Samajwadi Party leader calls PM Narendra Modi a terrorist, Twitter explodes
text:
Samajwadi Party leader calls PM Narendra Modi a terrorist, Twitter explodes Samajwadi Party leader calls PM Narendra Modi a terrorist, Twitter explodes "Their efforts to defame Uttar Pradesh will not succeed, BJP will face a fate here that will be worse than that in Bihar"- Rajendra Chaudhary By: FE Online | New Delhi | Published: February 20, 2017 3:31 PM SP’s Rajendra Chaudhary called PRime Minister Narendra Modi and Amit Shah terrorist. 
A day after PM Narendra Modi generated a huge controversy by virtually claiming that in Uttar Pradesh the Samajwadi Party led Chief Minister Akhilesh Yadav government was playing vote bank politics and even discriminating against the Hindus in the state with his statement during the Fatehpur rally on Sunday that, “When electricity is available on Ramzan, then it should be made available during Diwali too.” (“Ramzan me bijli aati hai tho Diwali me bhi aani chahiye; Bhedbhav nahi hona chahiye). Samajwadi Party leader Rajendra Chaudhary called PM Modi and BJP party president Amit Shah terrorist while addressing media. He said that, “both Modi and Amit Shah are creating terror among the people and are polluting the political environment. The people of Uttar Pradesh will take revenge for this offence. Their efforts to defame Uttar Pradesh will not succeed, BJP will face a fate here that will be worse than that in Bihar.” Narendra Modi’s party lost very badly in the Bihar elections against Nitish Kumar in 2015. 
Check out the twitter reaction- @ANINewsUP cc @malviyamit what he says? Our PM is terrorist? BJP should share this video in entire poorvanchal. @AmitShah 
— Anil Agrawat (@HariyaneKaChora) February 20, 2017 @ANINewsUP आप लोग आतंक करते है,आतंकवादियों को जेल से निकालने का काम आप लोग करते है।राज्य में डर आतंक सपा के नेता मंत्री काटते है। 
— यूपी का परिवर्तन✌ (@TrueOfUP) February 20, 2017 @ANINewsUP @ANI_news :if pm is terrorist then I wonder hw r u alive aftr telling so much against him???? 
— dinkar kumar (@3310Dinkar) February 20, 2017 @ANINewsUP वाह राजिंद्रचौधरी वाह क्याग़ज़ब कामकियाहै SPकेदुश्मनभी वो न करसकते जोतुमने मोदीजीकोआंतकवादी बताकरBJPको इनामदियाहै लगगई तेरीतो 
— Dr MLG (@mlgupta31) February 20, 2017 @ANINewsUP राजेंद्र चौधरी किनकी संतान हैं आजतक इनके गांव वालों को पता नहीं चला…लोग कहते हैं कि राजेंद्र चौधरी ‘मोहल्ला-प्रॉडक्ट’ हैं 
— Shashank Pradhan (@PradhanShashank) February 20, 2017 @ANINewsUP Modi ji pe ungli uthane se pehle khud dekhle ki teri kya aukaad hai, mulayam k chamche.
